languages.text: Усилившаяся буря накрыла отряд, будто намереваясь похоронить его во тьме, снегу и сминающих все вихрях.
The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.
languages.original_text: Усилившаяся буря накрыла отряд, будто намереваясь похоронить его во тьме, снегу и сминающих все вихрях.

traits.locale_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.
The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

languages.text: 风暴变得越来越强，将一行人笼罩其中，仿佛要将他们埋葬在黑暗、暴雪与肆虐的狂风之中。
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: 风暴变得越来越强，将一行人笼罩其中，仿佛要将他们埋葬在黑暗、暴雪与肆虐的狂风之中。

languages.text: 勢いを増す嵐は、一行を闇と雪、そしてホワールウィンドの中へ埋めて全滅させようとするかのように吹き荒ぶ。
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: 勢いを増す嵐は、一行を闇と雪、そしてホワールウィンドの中へ埋めて全滅させようとするかのように吹き荒ぶ。

languages.text: La tormenta, cada vez más imperante, se abate sobre el grupo como si tratara de sepultarlo entre oscuridad, nieve y torbellinos arrasadores.
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: La tormenta, cada vez más imperante, se abate sobre el grupo como si tratara de sepultarlo entre oscuridad, nieve y torbellinos arrasadores.

languages.text: La tempête qui s'intensifie déferle sur le groupe comme pour l'ensevelir sous les ténèbres, la neige et les tourbillons dévastateurs.
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: La tempête qui s'intensifie déferle sur le groupe comme pour l'ensevelir sous les ténèbres, la neige et les tourbillons dévastateurs.

languages.text: Der stärker werdende Sturm fegt über die Gruppe hinweg, als wolle er sie in Dunkelheit, Schnee und Windhosen begraben.
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: Der stärker werdende Sturm fegt über die Gruppe hinweg, als wolle er sie in Dunkelheit, Schnee und Windhosen begraben.

languages.text: Güçlenen fırtına; grubu karanlığa, kara ve yok edici fırtınaya gömmek istercesine onları ezip geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The escalating storm sweeps over the group as if trying to bury them in darkness, snow, and obliterating whirlwinds.

traits.locale_text: Güçlenen fırtına; grubu karanlığa, kara ve yok edici fırtınaya gömmek istercesine onları ezip geçti.
